pages.title: Herbology
pages.text: Many common plants are used in the preparation of $(item)brews$() and magicks, this book details those rare or exceptional plants not known to the common folk.

pages.title: Belladonna Flower
pages.text: Deadly nightshade, so is this plant known, and deadly poisons from it grown. It grows in tilled earth in stages. Tall grass yields seeds.

pages.title: Belladonna Flower
pages.text: Deadly nightshade, so is this plant known, and deadly poisons from it grown. It grows in tilled earth in stages. Tall grass yields seeds.

pages.title: Ember Moss
pages.text: A plant with a unique defense, when disturbed it bursts into flames. Harvest with shears. It can live anywhere, but spreads only on $(item)grass$(), $(item)dirt$() and $(item)sand$(). Mutate this plant from another with $(item)Mutandis$().

pages.title: Glint Weed
pages.text: Emits an unearthly glow that illuminates it's surround. It can live anywhere, but spreads only on $(item)grass$(), $(item)dirt$() and $(item)sand$(). Mutate this plant from another with $(item)Mutandis$().

pages.title: Mandrake Root
pages.text: It's parsnip-shaped root has the look of a man. Harvest at night, lest it waken and scream. It grows in tilled earth in stages. Tall grass yields seeds.

pages.title: Snowbell Flower
pages.text: A curious plant, cold as the snow, freezes moisture as it grows. It grows in tilled earth in stages. Tall grass yields seeds.

pages.title: Spanish Moss
pages.text: A creeper-like moss that grows best on trees, forms the best poppets that can be. Harvest with shears to keet it intact. Mutate this plant from another with $(item)Mutandis$().

pages.title: Wild Bramble
pages.text: This thorny bramble spreads around, when you try to pull it down. Mutate this plant from $(item)cactus$() and $(item)spanish moss$().

pages.title: Ender Bramble
pages.text: This strange bramble keeps creatures at bay; for when they get close it teleports them away. Mutate this plant from $(item)sugar cane$() and $(item)spanish moss$().

pages.title: Void Bramble
pages.text: This strange bramble keeps creatures at bay; for when they get close it teleports them away. Created and fueled with magic no rituals will function near to it.

pages.title: Water Artichoke Globe
pages.text: A water-bred plant with strange effect, fills the belly then empties it. It grows on still water in stages. Tall grass yields seeds.

pages.title: Grassper
pages.text: A curious plant that holds whatever it is given. Mutate this plant from tall grass and an empty chest.

pages.title: Critter Snare
pages.text: Small creatures are this plants' prey, it snaps them up - never to get away. Mutate this plant from $(item)alder saplings$(), a $(item)web$() and a $(item)zombie$().

pages.title: Blood Poppy
pages.text: In a witches garden keep in mind, a scratch from this rose leaves your blood behind. Mutate this plant from $(item)poppies$() and a $(item)leech chest$().

pages.title: Wispy Cotton
pages.text: A make-believe plant that only grows, in the deepest of sleep, where one dreams go.

pages.title: Wolfsbane
pages.text: Its name is the clue, the werewolf's secret it does undo. It grows in tilled earth in stages. Tall grass yields seeds.

pages.title: Garlic
pages.text: A flavor for food at day, at night it keeps vampires away. It grows in tilled earth in stages. Tall grass yields seeds.

pages.title: Alder Sapling
pages.text: The alder wood appears to bleed when cut, this tree brings misfortune to all. Mutate the sapling from another plant with $(item)Mutandis$().

pages.title: Hawthorn Sapling
pages.text: Hawthorn is the tree of purity, it has long history in the field of herbalism. Mutate the sapling from another plant with $(item)Mutandis$().

pages.title: Rowan Sapling
pages.text: The rowan, or mountain-ash has an affinity with mgic other trees seldom match. Mutate this plant from another with $(item)Mutandis$().
